name: Java (Basic) Certificate
description: Covers fundamental concepts of the Java programming language.
largeDescription: This certificate verifies core Java skills including classes, data structures, inheritance, exception handling, and more. Candidates are expected to be proficient in either Java 7 or Java 8.

name: Software Engineer Certificate
description: Covers problem solving, SQL, and REST API concepts.
largeDescription: This certificate validates foundational knowledge required for a software engineer role, including analytical problem solving, basic SQL database operations, and understanding of RESTful APIs.
